metadata.name: Windows Firewall Profile Disabled
metadata.comment: Detects when a user disables the Windows Firewall via a Profile to help evade defense.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-netfirewallprofile ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -enabled ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' false')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -all ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('public')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('domain')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('private'))))

output.summary: Detects when a user disables the Windows Firewall via a Profile to help evade defense.
